documents.document: @FidzyO ... On ''behalf of the Irish people'' on St. Patrick's day is sickening.
For me the Irish shamrock has always been a symbol of togetherness and the fact that it's going to be presented to Trump by our Taoiseach...
Starting a new job tomorrow. I have to be up in 5 hours and I cannot get to sleep! Why now insomnia????
Finally saw La La Land. What an absolutely stunning film!
The world is truly moving backwards. https://t.co/fXo6yHvxbR
And sending all my love to those who are currently detained. I'm so sorry this is happening to you. #NoMuslimBan
So heart breaking to see what's going on. But to those who are in the airports showing your love you are beautiful human beings. #MuslimBan
Someone please hide all of Donald Trumps pens!
@KatieOurMatie Ooooh is love to do that at some point. I'll have to pick your brains on how to sort it out!
@tiptoehappiness I was playing until 2am XD
@SuperArtFight #SuperArtStream It has decended into sound effects madness!!!
#30DaySongChallenge https://t.co/Q1f7zO6lEh Day 5: A Song that needs to be played loud!
https://t.co/MGv8xqhR7h #30DaySongChallenge Day 4: I love this song, but was playing whilst I had a horrible interaction with a horrible man
Super late but HEY @SuperArtFight #SuperArtStream !!! :D
Sending my love to all those marching around the world today! ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️ #WomensMarch
https://t.co/1HHpH2zUby #30daysongchallenge Day 3: A Song that Reminds you of Summer.
Today is my last day on @kivacando with @KavaleerTweets ! Super sad to be leaving but excited by the amazing show I got to help create! ❤️
30 Day Music Challenge Day 2: A Song with a Number in the Title: https://t.co/GNSLRnvAy0
30 Day Music Challenge Day 1: A Song you like with a colour in the title. Enjoy this 90's gem! https://t.co/h62GzS1IfZ
@charratastica Yesss join me! I think you can just post a song! I'm gonna link the youtube videos :D
@FidzyO DAY 1: A Song with a colour in the title! Enjoy this 90's gem! https://t.co/h62GzS1IfZ
Gonna try and do this so you guys can enjoy my strange and muddled taste in music just as much as I do! https://t.co/CwJeB3gpTX
Let's kick this weeks butt!!!!
I have two hours to draw my witchsona..... Time to stick on Steven Universe and doodle!
2. ... illness I've pretty much gotta catch up on a weeks worth of work. I'm gonna need a lot of Coke Zero, pink lady apples and Hamilton...
1. This coming week is going to be seriously tough. Not only is it my last week on @kivacando with the awesome @KavaleerTweets but due to...
@sephiramy Whoooooo!! Congrats! ♥
Can't sleep! Wow those tablets really were non drowsy.....
I actually feel somewhat alive today, I might try to venture outside...
Starting to feel somewhat human again....thanks to cold & flu tablets -___-
Woot!! Finally caught up on @CriticalRole! Being ill has some perks, not many...but some!
I haven't been this sick since 4th year of college, when I was struggling to finish my thesis through the worst flu ever!
I can't talk and I feel like someone tried to stuff me into a trash compactor. Everything hurts!!
Woke up this morning unable to talk. Today is going to be very quiet in my wee corner of the studio.
@1fivefive Your hair is looking particularly poofy there!
Noooooooo @CriticalRole spoilers first thing in the morning -____- I'm still 2 1/2 eps behind!
@1fivefive Well work will be fun :D
I keep having a dream about people trying to pack a bag for a trip, and I can't help them and it's stressing me out.
@deevseverything @stephen_duignan That picture freaks me out to this day!
Feeling a bit like death warmed up!
Sick in bed listening to the #Moana soundtrack and this happened! #art #fanart #procreate #disney #itcallsme https://t.co/HY777h9XV4
My preorder of mass effect andromeda is going to be staring at me from within Origin for over two months! This is like a form of torture!
@falldogs I am so so excited!!! Been waiting to fly away with N7 for too long!
@BrandonChalmers @SuperArtFight Woot! Mines a Manx cat apparently! :)
@SuperArtFight Haha!! Hopefully I'm one of the gems XD also I'm an excellent finder!! did @BrandonChalmers ever look up his patronus?
@SuperArtFight I'm 14 mins into the newest podcast episode and as a proud Hufflepuff, all I can say is I'm offended! ;P
I also got to open my @britsketch Calendar girl that I got at CTNX. Brittany was seriously one… https://t.co/tBfBem2mFJ
Thought it'd be a great idea to absolutely wreck my drawing wrist day before I go back to work.... Well done me!
I just audibly squealed! It's too much <3 https://t.co/bRy1JbhHC2
The laziest of St. Stephens Days has been had. Now it's time to play some dragon age and drink some tea!
Happy Winters Crest❤️🎄❤️ this was my piece for the Critmas gallery! I thought Trinket might be sick of chicken by n… https://t.co/7Ye785HzBF
I am very full of Christmas dinner right now. Someone roll me to the sitting room....
@GeekandSundry Thank you @VoiceOfOBrien for putting all of this together! The gallery is stunning <3
The Critmas gallery is up and the art is insanely amazing!!!! Check it out! #CriticalRole There may be a sneaky pic… https://t.co/Ul3yi6IicD
@merlerser I have an iPad pro. You can also get custom brushes for it online :) there's a procreate forum where you can find info!
@merlerser I've been learning it recently and it's super easy to get used to! Can't wait to see what you do with it! :D
It hurts my soul that I haven't seen Moana yet...
You know you're unfit when you can taste blood after running for a minute.
My bus didn't arrive......thanks Monday!
Okay.... Think I have most of my Christmas shopping done! :D panic over!
Need to try and stay away from @CriticalRole spoilers today. I'm still a few eps behind, but hopefully things went well *thumbs up*
Rudolph the red nose reindeers, had a very tasty nose! This years work Christmas bake! I made… https://t.co/b5SwA2t4kx
@sissycity Haha! Yeah fixes got a bit nasty! Nah!, just some junkies at my delightful bus stop. A lovely Christmas scene it was!
So eh..... Just witnessed someone pulling a knife and someone else @____@
@ChrisOatley ahhhh I was too slow! Probably for the best, not sure if I could have made all the classes. Enjoy PD 6!! :D
@sephiramy ;D I wear the tshirt with pride!
@sephiramy ...told in a beautiful way. ❤️❤️
@sephiramy I just want to say how amazing it has been following along with Mona and the gang from the start. It is such a beautiful story...
@dankelby I've streamed a little bit but not on twitch (I wasn't able to figure it out in my PC) and it was fine. You should give it a go :D
I forgot my earphones so I'm going a bit mental on the bus!!
#2006v2016 took a while to find a pic, but this was me at my most emo in 2006 ;D age 16 v age 26 https://t.co/Zd4UJfrKmh
I can't actually find any pics from 2006 :(
Happiest of birthdays to the amazing @ChrisOatley ! You have created something very special and brought so many people together. Thank you❤️
My process video of my Ariel piece is now up on youtube if you'd like to have a look <3 #art #timelapse #ariel https://t.co/Dw0t6P0Cxk

Morning retweet! 🐥 https://t.co/CKNgmeb9Et
I just sneezed so hard I split my lip open........what an exciting (and painful) life I lead!
#Drawcember day 2. A wee Ariel and her fishy friend flounder #ariel #thelittlemermaid #fanart https://t.co/OEeEGXGjx6
#LateLateToyShow Yay!!! Paddy Cap child has arrived! And Oh....oh stop Tubs, the poor child and his wee lamb!
#LateLateToyShow Gah! Demon Child!!!!
#LateLateToyShow Aye aye aye! Janey that's one sassy little girl!
#LateLateToyShow Not gonna lie, I want that hat!
#LateLateToyShow Ah tubs you need to work on the ole breathing XD
#LateLateToyShow Here we go!
This is gonna be awesome!!! *queues Footloose* https://t.co/wOL9g7L0pd
@OlanRogers Ahhhhhhhhhh that's amazing!!! So so happy for you, it's gonna be super sweet!!
My bus is now 45 mins late and it's raining. Don't they know it's toy show night?
My first sketch on the iPad Pro :D loving it so far!!! #sketch #procreate #ipadpro https://t.co/VJTFiQfBNG
It is done! Expect many procreate sketches!! ;D
@FidzyO or maybe after Christmas? Ahhhh I don't know!
I may be buying an iPad pro today.... That might be a thing that's happening!
To my arty friends! I'm thinking of getting an iPad pro and was wondering if anyone who has one would recommend it?
I've been decorating the @JamMusicIRL window for Christmas :D https://t.co/G9Df0h83KX
Can't sleep and I've to be up in 2 hours :(
@sephiramy I've never been more relieved for a tiny movement than in that last panel *sighs with relief* ❤️
I've gotten to the point of tiredness where I'm physically shaking
Now I just need to travel for 18 hours! No biggie!
Well I'm heading home today! It was an amazing trip and I'm super bummed it's over, but hopefully it won't be too long before another CTNX!
Ahhhhhh #CTNX2016 artist tent is like inspiration heaven. And everyone is so so nice. My wallet is a lot lighter though!
@Jtown67 woot! So happy I managed to get one! Thank you so much!
